product_name: Advanced Elements Backbone Internal Kayak Frame - AdvancedFrame Single Kayak
long_description: This addition to your AdvancedFrame Single Kayak will improve tracking and rigidity during less than perfect conditions on the water. The Backbone is inserted underneath the floor panel and runs the entire length of the kayak preventing the kayak from flexing while paddling. Collapsible design allows you to store the Backbone in the kayak's storage bag. Install the Backbone prior to inflating your kayak.
short_description: This addition to your AdvancedFrame Single Kayak will improve tracking and rigidity during less than perfect conditions on the water.
